Maize_Leaf_Blight.name: Maize Leaf Blight
Maize_Leaf_Blight.symptoms: Long, elliptical gray-green or tan lesions on leaves
Maize_Leaf_Blight.treatment: Apply fungicides containing mancozeb or chlorothalonil
Maize_Leaf_Blight.prevention: Crop rotation, resistant varieties, proper field drainage

Coffee_Leaf_Rust.name: Coffee Leaf Rust
Coffee_Leaf_Rust.symptoms: Yellow-orange powdery spots on leaf undersides
Coffee_Leaf_Rust.prevention: Plant resistant varieties, proper spacing, good air circulation

Banana_Black_Sigatoka.name: Black Sigatoka
Banana_Black_Sigatoka.symptoms: Black streaks on leaves that develop into large spots
Banana_Black_Sigatoka.treatment: Regular fungicide application, remove infected leaves
Banana_Black_Sigatoka.prevention: Good drainage, proper spacing, resistant varieties

Cassava_Mosaic.name: Cassava Mosaic Disease
Cassava_Mosaic.symptoms: Yellow mottling of leaves, leaf distortion
Cassava_Mosaic.prevention: Use disease-free planting material, resistant varieties

Bean_Rust.name: Bean Rust
Bean_Rust.symptoms: Rusty brown spots on leaves and pods
Bean_Rust.prevention: Crop rotation, resistant varieties, proper spacing
